page.title: 04Meeting places - Bromp on Sw
page.content: {1.VILLAGE HALL.}Weekly meetings of Toddler group,Playschool, Cubs,Air Scouts;monthly meetings of Yorkshire Country Women Assoc. Mothers Union. {2.C.ofE.CHURCH.2}Services every Sunday and some weekdays.Sunday School every Sunday morning.Festivals at Christmas and Easter.Also Flower Festival & Harvest Festival.Primary school meets on last day of term. {3.OLD SCHOOL ROOM}Polling Station, Keep fit, Village sports. P.O. Post goes to Darlington.People buy food get pensions.Most village people use it.Village notice board. {4.METHODIST CHURCH}.Sunday morning service, Monday Club. {5.PUBLIC HOUSES.}The King William,The Rose and Crown.Open every dinner time & evening for drinks and snacks.
